dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: An international fraud suspect was just caught at Almaty Airport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An international fraud suspect was just caught at Almaty Airport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A foreign national wanted on an international warrant was detained at Almaty Airport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the Ministry of Internal Affairs said he was wanted for a pet-selling scam back in Turkey.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the Ministry of Internal Affairs said he was wanted for a pet-selling scam back in Turkey.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He had been on the international wanted list on suspicion of fraud committed in Turkey. In 2018, the suspect posted a fake online advertisement about selling pets, defrauded 67 people, and then fled Turkey, the ministry said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and apparently he defrauded, uh, 67 people in 2018 with fake online ads before fleeing the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and apparently he defrauded, uh, sixty seven people in twenty eighteen with fake online ads before fleeing the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2018, the suspect posted a fake online advertisement about selling pets, defrauded 67 people, and then fled Turkey, the ministry said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a lot of victims—and such a specific, like, cruel scheme, targeting people looking for pets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a lot of victims-and such a specific, like, cruel scheme, targeting people looking for pets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Transport police officers were the ones who actually detained him at the airport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Transport police officers were the ones who actually detained him at the airport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the man was apprehended by transport police officers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder how they identified him so quickly—like, did Interpol flag him or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder how they identified him so quickly-like, did Interpol flag him or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Probably, since he was on an international warrant. They've placed him in a temporary detention facility now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably, since he was on an international warrant. They've placed him in a temporary detention facility now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The detainee has been placed in a temporary detention facility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting that this comes right after that incident with the teenager's joke causing flight delays at the same airport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting that this comes right after that incident with the teenager's joke causing flight delays at the same airport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, a teenager's inappropriate joke at Almaty Airport led to flight delays and temporary flight restrictions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, that was wild—shows how seriously they're taking security there lately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, that was wild-shows how seriously they're taking security there lately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. You don't wanna mess around at Almaty Airport these days, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. You don't wanna mess around at Almaty Airport these days, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely not. And this guy thought he could just, like, slip through—big mistake.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely not. And this guy thought he could just, like, slip through-big mistake.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So what happens next? Extradition to Turkey, I assume?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So what happens next? Extradition to Turkey, I assume?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Most likely, since the charges are from there. He's gonna have to answer for those 67 cases of fraud.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Most likely, since the charges are from there. He's gonna have to answer for those sixty seven cases of fraud.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2018, the suspect posted a fake online advertisement about selling pets, defrauded 67 people, and then fled Turkey, the ministry said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Serves him right—preying on people's emotions like that. Pets are a sensitive thing for a lot of folks.
